titleStmt.title: Novum lumen chirurgicum vindicatum, or, The new light of chirurgery vindicated from the many unjust aspersions of some unknown calumniators : with the addition of some few experiments made this winter in England / by Jo. Colbatch ...
titleStmt.author: Colbatch, John, Sir, 1670-1729.
Baker, Robert, Chirurgeon.

notesStmt.note: Experiments II and III signed: Robert Baker.
Reproduction of original in the Emanuel College Library, Cambridge University.
